trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> that holds the content of an XPS document.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于保存 XPS 文档内容的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> that comprises one or more <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>包含<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>，其中包含一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor is passed a reference to a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>构造函数已传递到了引用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>为编写、 存储和读取文档的内容的元素。

trans-unit.source: A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is created by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 新的空[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>通过创建<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is opened by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 现有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>通过打开<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>根添加到一个空[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, or on individual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements that are stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> 此外可以与关联的打印机信息和控件的元素<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>，或对各个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>中存储的元素<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]请参阅 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例还演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The target [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 的目标 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] 包。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class with access to a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> and default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: 通过访问指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 和使用默认的隔行扫描、资源及压缩选项来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例还演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The target package for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 的目标包。

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: 包压缩选项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class that is contained in a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> with specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的默认隔行扫描、资源和压缩选项初始化指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 中包含的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例还演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the target <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 的目标 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: The file I/O mode in which to open the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 的文件 I/O 模式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class that is contained in a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: 用默认的隔行扫描、资源和压缩选项初始化指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 文件中包含的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例还演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The target package for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 的目标包。

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: 包压缩选项。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document as a string.
trans-unit.target: 文档的字符串形式的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class that is contained in a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> with the specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的默认隔行扫描、资源和压缩选项初始化指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 中包含的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例还演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the target <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 的目标 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: The file I/O mode in which to open the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 的文件 I/O 模式。

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: 包压缩选项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class that is contained in a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: 用默认的隔行扫描、资源和压缩选项初始化指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 文件中包含的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例还演示如何创建和关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: Adds a root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> to the package and returns a writer.
trans-unit.target: 将根 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> 添加到包中并返回一个编写器。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] fixed-document sequence writer for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 固定文档序列编写器。

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 虽然此类使用的单数名称，但<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是一个一组 （序列）<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或多个文档。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method to insert content into an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A>方法插入到内容<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The format of the image.
trans-unit.target: 图像的格式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a thumbnail image to the package.
trans-unit.target: 向包中添加缩略图像。

trans-unit.source: The newly added <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" />.
trans-unit.target: 新添加的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" />。

trans-unit.source: Closes the XPS document <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: 关闭 XPS 文档 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> was opened for write access, data buffers are written to the store and the physical document <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>已打开以进行写访问，数据缓冲区写入到应用商店和物理文档<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>已关闭。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Close%2A> has been called, no parts of the document can be accessed with this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Close%2A>已被调用，该文档的任何部分可以访问与此<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to open, insert content, and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何打开，插入内容，然后关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to open, write to, and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例还演示如何打开，写入，然后关闭<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the core <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties" /> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档的核心 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties" />。

trans-unit.source: The core properties of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /><see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: 核心属性<see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to write.
trans-unit.target: 要编写的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> for writing an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个用于编写 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> to use for writing the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: 要用于编写 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> method in order to write an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>方法，以写入<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> and optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的所有资源此<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Other objects can call <see langword="Dispose" /> multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 其他对象可以调用<see langword="Dispose" />多次。

trans-unit.source: When you override <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that were previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 当你重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请注意不要引用以前已释放的以前调用在对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" /> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个用于阅读文档的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" /> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于阅读文档的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 虽然此类使用的单数名称，但<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是一个一组 （序列）<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或多个文档。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.FixedDocumentSequenceReader%2A> in order to access <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> parts in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何获取<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.FixedDocumentSequenceReader%2A>才能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>中部件<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the fixed-document sequence at the root of the package.
trans-unit.target: 返回位于包根位置的固定文档序列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> of the package.
trans-unit.target: 包的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />。

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 虽然此类使用的单数名称，但<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是一个一组 （序列）<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或多个文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is readable.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示包是否可读。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the package is readable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果包可读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package can be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可对包进行数字签名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the package can be signed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可对包进行签名，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is writable.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示包是否可写。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the package is writable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果包可写，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The signature that is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 已删除的签名。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a signature from the package.
trans-unit.target: 从包中删除签名。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取与包关联的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] 签名的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> objects that represent the signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" />，这些对象表示与包关联的签名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Signatures%2A> list identifies what parts are signed and whether the signatures are valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Signatures%2A>列表标识哪些部分进行签名以及签名是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts by using a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 X.509 证书对包部件的集合进行签名。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <see langword="null" /> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: 用于对每个部件签名的 X.509 证书；或为 <see langword="null" /> 以提示用户选择已安装的证书。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在包中存储证书，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts must be excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: 指示必须从签名中排除的依赖部件的标志。

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 X.509 证书对包部件集合进行签名。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" />，其中包含有关签名的信息。

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: 如果`certificate`是`null`，会出现的对话框，使用户能够选择已安装的 X.509 证书，例如从智能卡读卡器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <see langword="null" /> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: 用于对每个部件签名的 X.509 证书；或为 <see langword="null" /> 以提示用户选择已安装的证书。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在包中存储证书，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts are excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: 指示从签名中排除的依赖部件的标志。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: 要指定给签名的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts by using a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 X.509 证书对包部件的集合进行签名。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" />，其中包含有关签名的信息。

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: 如果`certificate`是`null`，会出现的对话框，使用户能够选择已安装的 X.509 证书，例如从智能卡读卡器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <see langword="null" /> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: 用于对每个部件签名的 X.509 证书；或为 <see langword="null" /> 以提示用户选择已安装的证书。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在包中存储证书，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts to exclude from the signing.
trans-unit.target: 指示要从签名中排除的依赖部件的标志。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: 要指定给签名的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to verify that <see cref="P:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable" /> is <see langword="true" /> before signing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在签名前验证 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable" /> 是否为 <see langword="true" />，则为 <see langword="true" /> ；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 X.509 证书对包部件集合进行签名。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" />，其中包含有关签名的信息。

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box is presented that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: 如果`certificate`是`null`，显示一个对话框，使用户能够选择已安装的 X.509 证书，例如从智能卡读卡器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if `certificate` is `null` and no certificates are installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> 如果引发`certificate`是`null`和未安装任何证书。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不能在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 改用类型安全的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与文档关联的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 缩略图像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> that represents the thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" />，表示与文档关联的缩略图像。
